prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Organ, Guitar, Brass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Brass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Brass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This song has Bass, Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Brass, but Piano is not part of it.
